data.title: Language, currency & distance selection : Rome2Rio
data.meta_description: Rome2Rio is currently available in eight languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Norwegian, Swedish, Dutch and Danish.  You can view transport pricing in 43 major currencies, choose between two time for...
data.text:
Rome2Rio is currently available in eight languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Norwegian, Swedish, Dutch and Danish.

You can view transport pricing in 43 major currencies, choose between two time formats (12hr & 24hr) and select either kilometres or miles to view your journey’s details. These options can be found by clicking the on the globe icon located in the top right hand corner of our transport search results page.

Rome2Rio is currently available in eight languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Norwegian, Swedish, Dutch and Danish.

You can view transport pricing in 43 major currencies, choose between two time formats (12hr & 24hr) and select either kilometres or miles to view your journey’s details. These options can be found by tapping ‘More’ in the bottom right hand corner of our transport search results page.
